name: Bagehot Limited
membership: Our Managing Director Sir Graham Watson is a Member of the European Economic and Social Committee (since Oct 2015)
goal: To provide its clients with information, intelligence and advice about matters of EU policy and to assist them in pursuit of their interests at EU level
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Sport, Taxation, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Brexit preparation, SESII, border management, regional policy, environment, financial services, sports policy, single market
